name: Scissors
how_to_perform:
1. Lie on your back on the mat or floor with your knees bent and feet flat.

2. Lift both legs off the ground, keeping them straight, while simultaneously squeezing your abdominal muscles to stabilize your lower back.

3. Move your legs in a zigzag pattern, crossing one leg over the other from side to side as quickly and as far apart from each other as possible without touching the floor or letting your hips swivel.

4. Continue executing rapid-fire crosses with your legs, maintaining tension through your core throughout.

5. Gradually reduce your tempo as you fatigue the exercise by slowing down the speed of the movements.
short_summary: Scissors is an isolation movement targeting the lower back muscles, executed by lying on the ground and rapidly crossing one leg over the other from side to side while maintaining active engagement in the core
